name: Xiaomi 17 Ultra
highlights:
Not announced yet
227g, 8.3mm thickness
Android 16, HyperOS 3
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front, fiber-reinforced plastic back or silicone polymer back (eco leather), aluminum frame
BODY.SIM:
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time)
BODY:
IP68 dust tight and water resistant (immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)
Aerospace-grade glass fiber

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 68B colors, 120Hz, 2160Hz PWM, Dolby Vision, HDR Vivid, HDR10+, 3500 nits (peak)

PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.7, 23mm (wide), 1.0"-type, 1.6µm, dual pixel PDAF, OIS
200 MP, f/2.4-2.9, 75-100mm (periscope telephoto), 1/1.4", 0.56µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS, 3-4.3x continuous optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.2, 14mm, 115˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.76", 0.64µm, dual pixel PDAF
TOF 3D, (depth)
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, color spectrum sensor, Leica lenses, Dual-LED flash, HDR, panorama, 67mm filter ring holder (optional)

SOUND:
24-bit/192kHz Hi-Res & Hi-Res Wireless audio
Qualcomm XPAN (24-bit/96kHz audio)

COMMS.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6e/7, dual-band or tri-band, Wi-Fi Direct
COMMS.Bluetooth: 6.0, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, LHDC 5
COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5), GLONASS

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, proximity, gyro, compass, barometer

BATTERY.Charging:
100W wired, PD3.0, QC3+
80W wireless
10W reverse wireless
